pageProduct.name: OGX Brazillian Keratin Therapy Ever Straight Conditioner 385mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

OGX Ever Straightening Brazilian Keratin Therapy Conditioner helps to strengthen and soften the hair.

OGX Ever Straightening+ Brazilian Keratin Therapy Conditioner
Why You Want It... This rich sulfate free conditioner formula with Brazilian coconut oil and keratin proteins will help smooth and strengthen your curly or wavy hair.

The smoothing conditioner features an exclusive blend of coconut oil, keratin proteins, avocado oil and cocoa butter to help strengthen and soften the hair, while helping to smooth the cuticle for strong tresses, adding a brilliant, luxurious glow and luminescent shine.


  • Keratin conditioner strengthens and smooths hair

  • Straightening formula is great for those looking to smooth wavy hair or maintain straight hair

  • Sulfate free sufactants, (sodium lauryl sulfate) SLS free

  • Not tested on animals

Size: 385mL

Shelf Life in Days: 912 days

KEY FEATURES

• Hair Straightening Conditioner
• Brazilian Keratin Therapy
• Soften & Smooth Hair


Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse immediately.

Ingredients

Water, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Steareth-20, Amodimethicone, Fragrance, Sodium Benzoate, Polyquaternium-47, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Polyquaternium-37, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Laurdimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, CI 16035, CI 19140, CI 42090.

Directions

After shampooing, apply conditioner generously to hair, working through ends. Wait 3-5 minutes. Rinse hair thoroughly. For best results use in conjunction with other OGX products.
